item.title: BjHMGS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjHMGS1 Gene Name: 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A synthase Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: HMGS assays confirmed that Escherichia coli-expressed recombinant BjHMGS1 shows HMGS activity that is inhibited by F244, a specific inhibitor of HMGS.

item.title: BnaSSA07.CRC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07G0307300ZS Gene Symbol: BnaSSA07.CRC Gene Name: CRABS CLAW Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaCRCs with domestication preference positively correlate with the seed-setting rate of canola.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC06G0356800ZS Gene Symbol: BnaSSC06.CRC Gene Name: CRABS CLAW Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaCRCs with domestication preference positively correlate with the seed-setting rate of canola.

item.title: BnC09.TT8b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC09g24870D Gene Symbol: BnC09.TT8b Gene Name: Genome: reference genome Darmor-bzh Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The simultaneous targeted mutation of BnA09.

item.title: BnGLK1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07g00410D Gene Symbol: BnGLK1a Gene Name: Golden2-like 1a Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: A Golden2-like transcription factor, BnGLK1a, improves chloroplast development, photosynthesis, and seed weight in rapeseed.

item.title: BnSCE3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnSCE3 Gene Name: Sinapine Esterase3 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of Sinapine Esterase BnSCE3 in Oilseed Rape Seeds Triggers Global Changes in Seed Metabolism.

item.title: BnWRI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnWRI1 Gene Name: AP2/EREBP transcription factor Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnWRI1 coordinates fatty acid biosynthesis and photosynthesis pathways during oil accumulation in rapeseed.

item.title: ClEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA1 Gene Name: α-expansin1 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: ClEXPA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA2 Gene Name: α-expansin2 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: ClNAC68
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C03G059250 Gene Symbol: ClNAC68 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: The NAC transcription factor ClNAC68 positively regulates sugar content and seed development in watermelon by repressing ClINV and ClGH3.

item.title: Cm-ETR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ETR1 Gene Name: ethylene receptor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In fully enlarged fruit the level of Cm-ERS1 mRNA was low in all tissues, whereas that of Cm-ETR1 mRNA was very high in the seeds and placenta.

item.title: CmLEC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CL4474.Contig1 Gene Symbol: CmLEC1 Gene Name: LEAFY COTYLEDON1 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CmLEC1 positively regulates the seed-setting rate in hybridization breeding of chrysanthemum.

item.title: CsCWIN3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G777580 Gene Symbol: CsCWIN3 Gene Name: Cell wall invertase 3 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cell wall invertase 3 (CsCWIN3) plays critical roles in providing sugars during pollination and fertilization in cucumber CsCWIN3-RNA interference plants also showed affected seed development.

item.title: GhMML3_A12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMML3_A12 Gene Name: MYBMIXTA-like transcription factor 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Small interfering RNAs from bidirectional transcripts of GhMML3_A12 regulate cotton fiber development.

item.title: GhMYB212
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.007G350500.1 Gene Symbol: GhMYB212 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 212 Genome: Phytozome v.

item.title: GhPAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G0607 Gene Symbol: GhPAS1 Gene Name: PAGODA1 SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The bHLH transcription factor GhPAS1 mediates BR signaling to regulate plant development and architecture in cotton.

item.title: GhSWEET12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gorai.005G195100 Gene Symbol: GhSWEET12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: RNA-seq and protein−DNA binding assays revealed that GhMYB212 was closely linked to the pathways of sucrose and starch transportation and metabolism, directly controling the expression of a sucrose transporter gene GhSWEET12.

item.title: GhVIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhVIP1 Gene Name: bZIP transcription factor 1 Genome: cotton genome (G.

item.title: GmAOX2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmAOX2b Gene Name: alternative oxidase 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A GmAOX2b antisense gene compromises vegetative growth and seed production in soybean.

item.title: GmHSP17.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.17G045800 Gene Symbol: GmHSP17.9 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A small heat shock protein, GmHSP17.

item.title: GmMIPS-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmMIPS-1|GmMIPS1 Gene Name: myo-inositol-3-phosphate synthase Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Localization of myo-inositol phosphate synthase (GmMIPS-1|GmMIPS1) during the early stages of soybean seed development.

item.title: GmMIPS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmMIPS1 Gene Name: myo-inositol-3-phosphate synthase1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: RNAi-mediated silencing of the myo-inositol-1-phosphate synthase gene (GmMIPS1) in transgenic soybean inhibited seed development and reduced phytate content.

item.title: GmNOD100;GmSS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G114000 Gene Symbol: GmNOD100 GmSS1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNOD100, a sucrose synthase in soybean nodules which was also preferentially expressed in the infected zone of nodules, similar to GmHSP17.

item.title: GmSPX5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma10g40820 Gene Symbol: GmSPX5 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Phosphate starvation responsive GmSPX5 mediates nodule growth through interaction with GmNF-YC4 in soybean.

item.title: Gshdz4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Gshdz4 Gene Name: transcription factor hdz4 Genome: Species: Glycine soja Functional Descriptions: A novel Glycine soja homeodomain-leucine zipper (HD-Zip) I gene, Gshdz4, positively regulates bicarbonate tolerance and responds to osmotic stress in Arabidopsis.

item.title: HSP22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HSP22 Gene Name: heat shock protein 22 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Variability within a pea core collection of LEAM and HSP22, two mitochondrial seed proteins involved in stress tolerance.

item.title: HvPAPhy_a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvPAPhy_a Gene Name: phytase purple acid phosphatase Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Barley HvPAPhy_a as transgene provides high and stable phytase activities in mature barley straw and in grains.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtKNOX4 Gene Name: class II KNOTTED-LIKE HOMEOBOX transcription factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtKNOX4-regulated MtKCS12 manifests hardseededness.

item.title: MtST1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g069810 Gene Symbol: MtST1 Gene Name: Specific Tissue 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Three members of Medicago truncatula ST family are ubiquitous during development and modulated by nutritional status (MtST1) and dehydration (MtST2 and MtST3).

item.title: PsAFB6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsAFB6 Gene Name: TIR1/AFB 6 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Pericarp PsAFB6 expression was suppressed by seeds and increased in response to deseeding, and exogenous hormone treatments suggest that seed-derived auxin and deseeding-induced ethylene are involved in these responses, respectively.

item.title: PsAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsAS1 Gene Name: Asparagine synthetase 1 Genome: Species: Pinus sylvestris Functional Descriptions: Coordination of PsAS1 and PsASPG expression controls timing of re-allocated N utilization in hypocotyls of pine seedlings.

item.title: PsGRP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsGRP1 Gene Name: putative glycine rich protein precursor Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Expression of PsGRP1, a novel glycine rich protein gene of Pisum sativum, is induced in developing fruit and seed and by ABA in pistil and root.

item.title: Pta1-MMP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Pta1-MMP Gene Name: matrix metalloproteinase 1 Genome: Species: Pinus taeda Functional Descriptions: Pta1-MMP protein has the structural characteristics of other plant MMPs, the recombinant protein exhibits Zn2+-dependent protease activity, and is inhibited by EDTA and the active site-binding hydroxamate inhibitor GM6001.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5A02G542600 Gene Symbol: TraesCS5A02G542600 Gene Name: transmembrane transporter Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: We identified putative candidate genes that are potentially involved in metal uptake, transport, and assimilation, including TraesCS5A02G542600 on chromosome 5A, which was annotated as a Major Facilitator Superfamily transporter and acted on all the minerals except K.

item.title: VvAGL11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_00025945001 Gene Symbol: VvAGL11|VvMADS5|VvAG3 Gene Name: Agamous-like MADS-box protein AGL11 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Molecular, genetic and transcriptional evidence for a role of VvAGL11|VvMADS5|VvAG3 in stenospermocarpic seedlessness in grapevine.

item.title: VvHB58
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GSVIVT01008065001 Gene Symbol: VvHB58 Gene Name: homeobox 58 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: The grapevine homeobox gene VvHB58 influences seed and fruit development through multiple hormonal signaling pathways.

item.title: VviAGL11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_18s0041g01880 Gene Symbol: VviAGL11 Gene Name: AGAMOUS-LIKE 11 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: VviAGL11 self-regulates and targets hormone- and secondary metabolism-related genes during seed development.

item.title: VviINO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_201s0127g00330 Gene Symbol: VviINO Gene Name: Vitis vinifera INNER NO OUTER Genome: Vitis vinifera genome 12X V2 Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: We conclusively demonstrated that the grapevine orthologue VviINO retains similar protein targets and activity in the grape as in Arabidopsis, since it could fully restore the outer integument growth in Arabidopsis ino-1 mutant.

item.title: VvMADS28
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvMADS28 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: In this study, we demonstrate an essential role for the grapevine MADS-box gene VvMADS28 in morphogenesis of the ovule.

item.title: VvMybPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvMybPA1 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor PA1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: A previous study has already identified VvMybPA1 as the first transcription factor involved in the regulation of the proanthocyanidin pathway during seed development in grapevine.
